page: AG40033: Production And Process Technology Of Industrial Crops

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Crop Production: Introduction to industrial crops; Agro-technique for production of energy crops, field crops, and plantation crops.Harvest, Postharvest and Processing Technology: Energy crops, Horticultural crops including floriculture; Medicinal and aromatic plants
